lines.text: Oh Maggie, are you really going to shoot me in front of Cody?
Close your eyes, honey.
[On the top ledge of a building]
If you believe? JUMP! If not, you come to me.
[She turns and looks at him]
After you?
What do you think about all that?
Oh, I don't know. I'm not sure I believe in that kind of thing.
Well that don't matter. It's there whether you believe or not believe. It don't care.
Can I ask you a personal question?
That depends on the question.
There's a rumor that before you joined the precinct you were a priest.
I was a seminary student, I didn't make it as far as priesthood.
Still, that is some kind of makeover. What happened?
I found another way to fight him... Okay, ready?
(confused) Fight who?
You're not like other children, Cody. Do you know that?
About a year ago, they started hunting children.
What does this have to do with Cody?
They believe she's the one they have been looking for. She's going to lead people to God, Maggie. Eric is going to try to change her, and if not...
Slaughter of the Innocents.
Do you promise to get her out of there? And get out as fast you can?
I've never fired a gun before, but I'll bet at this range I'm dead-on.
Well you'll catch him, I got a good feeling about this.
You do, huh?
You're wrong about one thing, though.
What's that?
You're not working alone tonight. A good man is never alone in this world.
Watch. If God loves his children so much, maybe he'll stop this. Redeem him, somehow. Or maybe the release I've offered him is his only salvation.
[Homeless man strikes match to light himself on fire, Cody blows out match and hugs homeless man]
He hasn't forgotten you.
[first lines]

[Haitian accent]
Did ya see it yet, darlin'?
Excuse me?
Star of Yakov. What they be callin' the Christmas star. Ain't been seen since Bethlehem. And now it's here.
That's nice.
Oh, yes. It's very nice. It's a good sign for all good people. Means someone special come from God. What do ya think 'bout that?
I don't know, I - I'm not sure I believe in that king of thing.
Oh, that don't matter. It's there if you believe or not believe. It don't care.
[Pulls trigger on gun three times, three clicks are heard]
Thou shalt not kill... especially with no bullets.
The devil's greatest achievement is that people don't believe he exists. Nowadays, the concept of evil is politically incorrect.

Jump, Cody, jump. If you believe in God, jump. And if not, you come to me. What do you believe in, Cody? My hand - it's here, you can see it. Satan rules it and it will protect you always... Or his hand? Is it there? Or isn't it? Will he catch you or not? If you believe, Cody, jump. JUMP!
After you.
She's special, you know that don't you? That's why they want her.
Hi Cody.
Hi.
We don't want to work today?
Please sister, after you!
Why thank-you, don't you think we should work today? I think we should.
Cody no work, Sister Rosa go work, Goodbye.
[last lines]
Honey, is everything okay?
Everything's okay, now.
